title: LF Plat+ Top, and bot lane to join ranked team
body:
Hi all my name is Shia LaRedBuff or Abyssial on the forums.
I am the manager of a new team Tenacity is setting up and we are looking for players to fill the Top, ADC and Support roles.
the requirements are to sign up and apply on the forums. {follow the link}[here](http://tenacitygaming.com/forums/topic/ranked-team-recruitment/page/6/#post-1660)
and to be plat or above in soloQ.
Another big part of being apart of this team is to be pretty chill and to not get angry when someone makes a mistake.
to apply on the forums [the layout on the forum can be confusing] go to this link Here

Thanks for reading and if you have any questions please add in game,
Shia LaRedBuff
